official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of certain real property located in Charleston, South Carolina, for a tour boat facility for Fort Sumter National Monument, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands in Charleston, South Carolina, for visitors facilities, including a tour boat dock and a museum, for Fort Sumter National Monument. Permits the Secretary to make subsequent conveyances of land and land interests to Charleston or to South Carolina, as specified. Authorizes the use of specified appropriations and authorizes appropriations for land acquisition and facility construction.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of certain real property located in Charleston, South Carolina, for a tour boat facility for Fort Sumter National Monument, and for other purposes.
